segments.text: What's the problem , Nada ? You look down in the dumps .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . My life is a big mess . Everything is so complicated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , nothing can be that bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But promise me , you'll keep it a secret .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I promise . So what's troubling you so much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've fallen in love with my boss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bo , of course not . He is still single .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I try to keep it to myself . But there is a lot of gossip about us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . Office romance tends to be the subject of gossip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Worse still , he is trying to avoid me these days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It gives me a lot of pressure and I feel depressed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cheer up , Nada . You'll be fine .
segments.speaker: S1
